params.targetAddress: OZ Ownable target address to bind OwnableToAccessControlAdapter to

returns._0: address of the newly deployed OwnableToAccessControlAdapter contract

deployNewOwnableToAccessControlAdapter(a.notice: Deploys new OwnableToAccessControlAdapter bound to the OZ Ownable contract specified.      Can be executed only by the OZ Ownable target owner. This owner is expected to transfer      the ownership to the newly deployed OwnableToAccessControlAdapter contract address.

userdoc.notice: Helper contract simplifying the deployment of the OwnableToAccessControlAdapter
